item.title: Where would I add this code?
item.dc:creator: @agent_nukks agent nukks
item.description:
@agent_nukks wrote:

[quote=“pwnedurmom, post:3, topic:220666”][quote author=agent nukks link=topic=289738.msg2338333#msg2338333 date=1216210582]
Hey hey, sorry about recent posts, I had a friend over and left my MoparScape page up.
But, I was wanting to know where I would add this code:

ase 127: if (specialAmount <= 70) { specialAmount += 30; } else { specialAmount = 100; } setAnimation(829); deleteItem(127, getItemSlot(127), 1); addItem(129, 1); LoadCorrectSpecBar(); break; case 129: if (specialAmount <= 70) { specialAmount += 30; } else { specialAmount = 100; } setAnimation(829); deleteItem(129, getItemSlot(129), 1); addItem(131, 1); LoadCorrectSpecBar(); break; case 131: if (specialAmount <= 70) { specialAmount += 30; } else { specialAmount = 100; } setAnimation(829); deleteItem(131, getItemSlot(131), 1); LoadCorrectSpecBar(); break;

Its a code for Restore potions to give you Special attack energy.
[/quote]
dude i reported one of your post on my post, im sorry =([/quote]

Ahh its ok =/

Read full topic
